usecase.name: Look for Talents
usecase.scenario: An employer searches for and views profiles of job seekers.
usecase.preconditions: Employer is logged in, has access to the talent search feature, and optionally has a membership to unlock full profiles.
steps: Employer navigates to the profile database
(Optional) Employer enters search criteria such as job category, location, or keywords
(Optional) Employer filters various criteria (current job, experience, education level, gender, location, etc.)
Employer views the profiles of job seekers and adds to shortlist
(Optional) Employer with membership unlocks the full profile of selected job seekers

testcases.name: Valid Talent Search
testcases.description: Verify that an employer can search for job seekers with valid search criteria and add profiles to the shortlist.

expected.outcome: Relevant job seeker profiles displayed and added to the shortlist

testcases.name: Talent Search Without Filters
testcases.description: Verify that an employer can search without any filters and see a general list of profiles.

expected.outcome: A general list of job seeker profiles is displayed

testcases.name: Filter Search Results
testcases.description: Verify that the employer can filter search results by various criteria (e.g., education level, experience).

expected.outcome: Filtered profiles matching the criteria are displayed

testcases.name: Unlock Full Profile with Membership
testcases.description: Verify that an employer with a membership can unlock and view the full profile of a job seeker.

expected.outcome: Full profile of the job seeker is unlocked and displayed

testcases.name: Attempt to Unlock Profile Without Membership
testcases.description: Verify that an employer without a membership is prompted to upgrade when trying to unlock a full profile.

expected.outcome: Prompt to upgrade to membership is displayed

project_description: Bikroy is a free app that allows users to buy, sell, and search for a wide variety of products and services in Bangladesh. There are several category of goods/properties which can be filtered along with the price range and Location of the product, which gives convenient searching experience to the users. Registered sellers can promote their selling adds. Employers can even post jobs in the app to find employees matching their job criteria.

usecase.name: Membership Registration
usecase.scenario: User registers to become a member on Bikroy.com by selecting a business category, picking a membership plan (Plus or Premium), and providing personal details.
usecase.preconditions: User is on the membership registration page and has not registered previously.
steps: User navigates to the 'Sign Up' page.
System displays a list of business categories (e.g., Cars, Electronics, Mobile Accessories, etc.).
User selects a business category (e.g., 'Mobile Accessories').
System displays membership plans with options such as Monthly, Quarterly, and Yearly under Plus and Premium categories.
User selects a membership plan (e.g., 'Plus - Monthly').
User fills in their business information, such as Business Name, Email, and Phone Number.
User clicks 'Continue to Pay'.
System redirects the user to the payment page.
User completes the payment for the selected plan.
System confirms the payment and activates the user's account with the selected business category and membership plan.
usecase.postconditions: User becomes a registered member with access to features according to their selected plan and business category.

testcases.name: Valid Registration with Business Category and Plan
testcases.description: Verify that a user can register successfully with valid details, select a business category, and choose a membership plan.

testcases.name: Invalid Registration - Missing Business Category
testcases.description: Verify that the system prevents registration if the user does not select a business category.

testcases.name: Invalid Registration - Missing Payment
testcases.description: Verify that the system prevents registration if the user does not complete the payment.

testcases.name: Valid Registration - Business Category and Yearly Plan
testcases.description: Verify that a user can successfully register with a Yearly plan and valid business category selection.

project_description: Bikroy is a free app that allows users to buy, sell, and search for a wide variety of products and services in Bangladesh. There are several category of goods/properties which can be filtered along with the price range and Location of the product, which gives convenient searching experience to the users. Registered sellers can promote their selling adds. Employers can even post jobs in the app to find employees matching their job criteria.

usecase.name: Creation of New Workspace
usecase.scenario: User creates a new workspace from their account.
preconditions: User is logged into their Notion account.
User does not exceed the maximum number of workspaces allowed.
steps: User navigates to 'Settings & Members' in the sidebar.
User selects 'Create or Join Workspace'.
User enters the workspace name and email domain, if applicable.
User clicks 'Create' to complete the process.

testcases.name: Successful Workspace Creation
testcases.description: Verify that the user can successfully create a new workspace with a unique name.

testcases.name: Duplicate Workspace Name
testcases.description: Verify that creating a workspace with an existing name does not matter

testcases.name: Exceeding Workspace Limit
testcases.description: Verify that the user cannot create more workspaces than their plan allows.

expected.outcome: Workspace creation failed due to exceeding workspace limit.

project_description: Notion is a productivity app that helps users manage tasks, projects, and knowledge. Notion can be used for a variety of purposes, including: Capturing thoughts, managing projects, Running a company, and Working on your own or on a team. User can create, join or switch between workspaces. Members can be added in a workspace and allowed mail domains can also be set up in a workspace. User collaborates with team members in a shared database with specific permissions.

usecase.name: Switching Workspaces
usecase.scenario: User switches between multiple workspaces they are a part of.
preconditions: User is a member of multiple workspaces.
steps: User clicks on their profile picture in the top-left corner.
User selects the workspace they want to switch to from the dropdown menu.
User is redirected to the selected workspace.

testcases.name: Successful Workspace Switch
testcases.description: Verify that the user can successfully switch to another workspace.

testcases.name: Switch to Unavailable Workspace
testcases.description: Verify that the user cannot switch to a workspace they have left or been removed from.

expected.outcome: Workspace switch failed due to unavailable access.

testcases.name: Switch to Same Workspace
testcases.description: Verify that selecting the current workspace does not reload or cause any issues.

expected.outcome: No action taken; remains in the same workspace.

project_description: Notion is a productivity app that helps users manage tasks, projects, and knowledge. Notion can be used for a variety of purposes, including: Capturing thoughts, managing projects, Running a company, and Working on your own or on a team. User can create, join or switch between workspaces. Members can be added in a workspace and allowed mail domains can also be set up in a workspace. User collaborates with team members in a shared database with specific permissions.

usecase.name: Joining an Existing Workspace
usecase.scenario: User joins an existing workspace by invitation or allowed domain.
preconditions: User has received an invitation or has an email matching the allowed domain.
User is logged into their Notion account.
steps: User clicks on the invitation link or logs in with an email matching the allowed domain.
User accepts the invitation to join the workspace.

testcases.name: Successful Join via Invitation
testcases.description: Verify that the user can join the workspace successfully using an invitation link.

testcases.name: Join with Invalid Invitation
testcases.description: Verify that the user cannot join the workspace using an expired or invalid invitation link.

expected.outcome: Join failed due to invalid invitation.

testcases.name: Join via Allowed Domain
testcases.description: Verify that the user can join the workspace using an email with an allowed domain.

expected.outcome: Joined workspace successfully using allowed domain.

testcases.name: Join via Restricted Domain
testcases.description: Verify that the user cannot join the workspace using an email with a restricted domain.

expected.outcome: Join failed due to restricted domain.

Notion can be used for a variety of purposes, including: Capturing thoughts, managing projects, Running a company, and Working on your own or on a team. User can create, join or switch between workspaces. Members can be added in a workspace and allowed mail domains can also be set up in a workspace. usecase.name: Update Workspace Name
usecase.scenario: User updates the name of current workspace
steps: User enters workspace name

testcases.name: Valid Workspace Name Selection
testcases.description: Verify that the user can successfully update the workspace name with a valid input.

testcases.name: Empty Workspace Name
testcases.description: Verify that the user cannot update the workspace name with an empty input.

Notion can be used for a variety of purposes, including: Capturing thoughts, managing projects, Running a company, and Working on your own or on a team. User collaborates with team members in a shared database with specific permissions.

usecase.name: Upload Workspace Icon
usecase.scenario: User updates the icon of current workspace
steps: User selects workspace icon

testcases.name: Valid Workspace Icon Selection
testcases.description: Verify that the user can successfully update the workspace icon with a valid file.

testcases.name: Empty Workspace Icon
testcases.description: Verify that the user cannot update the workspace icon without selecting a file.

testcases.name: Invalid Workspace Icon File Type
testcases.description: Verify that the user cannot update the workspace icon with an invalid file type.

testcases.name: Corrupted Workspace Icon
testcases.description: Verify that the user cannot update the workspace icon with a valid file type but corrupted data.

testcases.name: Large Workspace Icon
testcases.description: Verify that the user cannot update the workspace icon with a file that exceeds the maximum file size.

Notion can be used for a variety of purposes, including: Capturing thoughts, managing projects, Running a company, and Working on your own or on a team. User can create, join or switch between workspaces. Members can be added in a workspace and allowed mail domains can also be set up in a workspace. User collaborates with team members in a shared database with specific permissions.

usecase.name: Delete Workspace
usecase.scenario: User deletes the current workspace
steps: User types 'Workspace Name' confirms deletion

testcases.name: Correct Workspace Name
testcases.description: Verify that the user can successfully delete the workspace with the correct workspace name.

testcases.name: Incorrect Workspace Name
testcases.description: Verify that the user cannot delete the workspace with an incorrect workspace name.

project_description: Notion is a productivity app that helps users manage tasks, projects, and knowledge. Notion can be used for a variety of purposes, including: Capturing thoughts, managing projects, Running a company, and Working on your own or on a team. User can create, join or switch between workspaces. Members can be added in a workspace and allowed mail domains can also be set up in a workspace. User collaborates with team members in a shared database with specific permissions.

usecase.name: Leaving a Workspace
usecase.scenario: User leaves a workspace they are a member of.
preconditions: User is logged into their Notion account.
User is a member of the workspace.
steps: User navigates to 'Settings & Members' in the sidebar.
User clicks on the 'Leave Workspace' button.
User confirms the action in the dialog box.

testcases.name: Successful Workspace Leave
testcases.description: Verify that the user can successfully leave a workspace they are a member of.

testcases.name: Leave Non-Member Workspace
testcases.description: Verify that the user cannot leave a workspace they are not a member of.

expected.outcome: Leave action failed because the user is not a member.

testcases.name: Cancel Leave Workspace
testcases.description: Verify that the user can cancel the leave action in the confirmation dialog.

project_description: Notion is a productivity app that helps users manage tasks, projects, and knowledge. Notion can be used for a variety of purposes, including: Capturing thoughts, managing projects, Running a company, and Working on your own or on a team. User can create, join or switch between workspaces. Members can be added in a workspace and allowed mail domains can also be set up in a workspace. User collaborates with team members in a shared database with specific permissions.

usecase.name: Adding Another Account
usecase.scenario: User adds another email account to their Notion account.
preconditions: User is logged into their primary Notion account.
User has access to the secondary email account.
steps: User navigates to 'Settings & Members' in the sidebar.
User clicks on 'My Account' and selects 'Add Email'.
User enters the new email address and verifies it through the email link sent.
User confirms the new email as added to their account.

testcases.name: Successful Account Addition
testcases.description: Verify that the user can successfully add another email account to their Notion account.

expected.outcome: New email added to the account successfully.Now all the workspaces related to the accounts are accessible from the Notion account

testcases.name: Invalid Email Format
testcases.description: Verify that the system prevents adding an email with an invalid format.

expected.outcome: Failed to add new email due to invalid format.

testcases.name: Email Already Linked
testcases.description: Verify that the system prevents adding an email that is already linked to the account.

expected.outcome: No action taken; remains in the same

testcases.name: Verify Email for Account Addition
testcases.description: Verify that the user must verify the email through the link sent to successfully add the account.

Notion can be used for a variety of purposes, including: Capturing thoughts, managing projects, Running a company, and Working on your own or on a team. User can create, join or switch between workspaces. Members can be added in a workspace and allowed mail domains can also be set up in a workspace. User collaborates with team members in a shared database with specific permissions.

usecase.name: Import Workspace
usecase.scenario: User imports entire workspace data from a file or cloud storage
steps: User uploads the file to be imported
Alternatively, user selects a cloud storage

testcases.name: Valid Workspace File
testcases.description: Verify that the user can successfully import the workspace with a valid file.

testcases.name: Invalid Workspace File
testcases.description: Verify that the user cannot import the workspace with an invalid file.

testcases.name: Valid Workspace Cloud Storage
testcases.description: Verify that the user can successfully import the workspace from a valid cloud storage.

testcases.name: Invalid Workspace Cloud Storage
testcases.description: Verify that the user cannot import the workspace from an invalid cloud storage.

project_description: Notion is a productivity app that helps users manage tasks, projects, and knowledge. Notion can be used for a variety of purposes, including: Capturing thoughts, managing projects, Running a company, and Working on your own or on a team. User can create, join or switch between workspaces. Members can be added in a workspace and allowed mail domains can also be set up in a workspace. User collaborates with team members in a shared database with specific permissions.

usecase.name: Add Member to Workspace
usecase.scenario: User adds a member to the current workspace
steps: User searches the email of the member to be added
User selects the person to be added or alternatively sends an invitation email

testcases.name: Invalid Email
testcases.description: Verify that the user cannot send an invitation to a member with an invalid email.

testcases.name: Person Already in Workspace
testcases.description: Verify that the user cannot add a person to the workspace who is already a member.

testcases.name: Person Found on Search
testcases.description: Verify that the user can successfully add a person to the workspace.

testcases.name: Person not Found on Search
testcases.description: Verify that the user can successfully send an invitation to a person to join the workspace.

testcases.name: Add Valid Member with Plus Subscription
testcases.description: Verify that the user can successfully add a member with the 'Member' role when the workspace has a Plus subscription.

expected.outcome: Invitation sent successfully with 'Member' role assigned.

testcases.name: Add Member Without Plus Subscription
testcases.description: Verify that when the user does not have a Plus subscription, all new members are assigned the 'Owner' role.

expected.outcome: Role selection defaults to 'Owner' as 'Member' role is not available without Plus subscription.

testcases.name: Add Member with Invalid Email
testcases.description: Verify that the system handles invalid email addresses during member addition.

expected.outcome: Failed to send invitation due to invalid email format.

testcases.name: Assign Workspace Owner Role
testcases.description: Verify that the user can assign the 'Workspace Owner' role to a new member regardless of subscription.

testcases.name: Invite Using Restricted Domain
testcases.description: Verify that the system prevents adding members with email addresses from restricted domains.

expected.outcome: Failed to send invitation due to restricted domain.

project_description: Notion is a productivity app that helps users manage tasks, projects, and knowledge. Notion can be used for a variety of purposes, including: Capturing thoughts, managing projects, Running a company, and Working on your own or on a team. User can create, join or switch between workspaces. Members can be added in a workspace and allowed mail domains can also be set up in a workspace. User collaborates with team members in a shared database with specific permissions.

usecase.name: Managing Allowed Email Domains
usecase.scenario: User sets or updates allowed email domains for the workspace.
usecase.preconditions: User is a workspace owner with permissions to modify settings.
steps: User navigates to 'Settings' under the workspace menu.
User scrolls to 'Allowed email domains'.
User enters the domain name to be allowed (e.g., 'company.com','ugrad.cse.buet.ac.bd').
User clicks 'Update' to save changes.

testcases.name: Adding Valid Allowed Domain
testcases.description: Verify that the user can add a valid email domain to the allowed list.

expected.outcome: Domain added successfully to the allowed list.

testcases.name: Adding Invalid Allowed Domain
testcases.description: Verify that the system handles invalid domain inputs correctly.

expected.outcome: Field not shown to be updated

testcases.name: Adding Public Domain
testcases.description: Verify that the system handles public domain inputs correctly.

testcases.name: Adding Educational Domain
testcases.description: Verify that the system handles public domain inputs correctly.

testcases.name: Removal Allowed Domain
testcases.description: Verify that the user can remove a previously added domain from the allowed list.

expected.outcome: Domain removed successfully from the allowed list.

project_description: Notion is a productivity app that helps users manage tasks, projects, and knowledge. Notion can be used for a variety of purposes, including: Capturing thoughts, managing projects, Running a company, and Working on your own or on a team. User can create, join or switch between workspaces. Members can be added in a workspace and allowed mail domains can also be set up in a workspace. User collaborates with team members in a shared database with specific permissions.

usecase.name: Export Workspace Content
usecase.scenario: User exports all workspace content for backup, sharing, or legal purposes.
preconditions: User is a workspace owner with permissions to export content.
User has a Business or Enterprise plan for PDF export.
steps: User navigates to 'Settings' under the workspace menu.
User clicks on 'Export all workspace content'.
User selects export options such as format (Markdown, HTML, CSV, PDF) and content inclusion.
User clicks 'Export' to download the content.

testcases.name: Valid Export as Markdown & CSV
testcases.description: Verify that the user can successfully export all workspace content in Markdown & CSV format.

testcases.name: Valid Export as HTML
testcases.description: Verify that the user can successfully export all workspace content in HTML format.

expected.outcome: Workspace content exported successfully in HTML format.

testcases.name: Valid Export as PDF with Enterprise Plan
testcases.description: Verify that the user can export workspace content as PDF when subscribed to an Enterprise plan.

expected.outcome: Workspace content exported successfully in PDF format.

testcases.name: PDF Export without Enterprise Plan
testcases.description: Verify that PDF export is not available without an Enterprise plan.

expected.outcome: PDF export failed due to lack of Enterprise plan.

testcases.name: Export with Insufficient Permissions
testcases.description: Verify that members without export permissions cannot export workspace content.

expected.outcome: Export failed due to insufficient permissions.

testcases.name: Exclude Private Pages from Export
testcases.description: Verify that private pages of other users are not included in the export.

expected.outcome: Workspace content exported successfully, excluding private pages.

testcases.name: Incorrect Export Format
testcases.description: Verify that the user cannot export the workspace with incorrect workspace export format.

project_description: Notion is a productivity app that helps users manage tasks, projects, and knowledge. Notion can be used for a variety of purposes, including: Capturing thoughts, managing projects, Running a company, and Working on your own or on a team. User can create, join or switch between workspaces. Members can be added in a workspace and allowed mail domains can also be set up in a workspace. User collaborates with team members in a shared database with specific permissions.

usecase.name: Rich Text Formatting
usecase.scenario: Users format their text with rich options adding links.
usecase.preconditions: The text block exists in the document.
steps: User selects the text block.
User applies the formatting options
User checks the formatted result.

testcases.name: Valid Text Hyperlinking
testcases.description: Verify that a user can add a hyperlink to selected text.

testcases.name: Valid Markdown Syntax
testcases.description: Verify that correct markdown content is rendered successfully.

testcases.name: Invalid Markdown Syntax
testcases.description: Verify that incorrect markdown results in failure to apply formatting.

expected.outcome: Formatting not applied due to incorrect markdown syntax.

testcases.name: Invalid Text Hyperlinking
testcases.description: Verify that an invalid link is not added to a content text.

testcases.name: Valid font change
testcases.description: Verify that a user can select a valid font of selected text.

testcases.name: Valid Text Coloring
testcases.description: Verify that a user can apply a color to the text.

expected.outcome: Text appears in the chosen color.

User can create, join or switch between workspaces. Members can be added in a workspace and allowed mail domains can also be set up in a workspace. usecase.name: Organize Content into Columns
usecase.scenario: A user arranges content side-by-side by creating multiple columns on a page.
usecase.preconditions: A Notion page with content exists.
steps: User drags and drops blocks into columns.
Content is organized into multiple columns.

testcases.name: Create Two Columns
testcases.description: Verify that a user can create two columns by dragging and dropping blocks.

testcases.name: Remove Columns
testcases.description: Verify that a user can remove a column by dragging the content back.

project_description: Notion is a productivity app that helps users manage tasks, projects, and knowledge. Notion can be used for a variety of purposes, including: Capturing thoughts, managing projects, Running a company, and Working on your own or on a team. User can create, join or switch between workspaces. Members can be added in a workspace and allowed mail domains can also be set up in a workspace. User collaborates with team members in a shared database with specific permissions.

usecase.name: Add Headings for Structure
usecase.scenario: The user adds headings to structure the content on a Notion page.
usecase.preconditions: A Notion page with content exists.
steps: User adds H1, H2, and H3 headings for different sections.
Content is structured with headings.

testcases.name: Valid Heading Creation
testcases.description: Verify that a user can add an heading to the page.

testcases.name: Header Creation in Incorrect Block
testcases.description: Verify that trying to add a header inside unsupported blocks (e.g., code blocks) fails.

project_description: Notion is a productivity app that helps users manage tasks, projects, and knowledge. Notion can be used for a variety of purposes, including: Capturing thoughts, managing projects, Running a company, and Working on your own or on a team. User can create, join or switch between workspaces. Members can be added in a workspace and allowed mail domains can also be set up in a workspace. usecase.name: Add Icons and Cover Art
usecase.scenario: A user personalizes a page by adding icons and cover images.
steps: User adds or changes the page icon.
User adds or changes the cover image.

testcases.name: Valid Icon Selection
testcases.description: Verify that a user can successfully add an icon to a page.

expected.outcome: Icon is added to the page.

testcases.name: Valid Cover Image
testcases.description: Verify that a user can successfully change the cover image on a page.

testcases.name: Invalid Cover Image type
testcases.description: Verify that an image change is rejected if the image type is wrong.

project_description: Notion is a productivity app that helps users manage tasks, projects, and knowledge. Notion can be used for a variety of purposes, including: Capturing thoughts, managing projects, Running a company, and Working on your own or on a team. User can create, join or switch between workspaces. Members can be added in a workspace and allowed mail domains can also be set up in a workspace. usecase.name: Add and Manage Images in Content
usecase.scenario: A user uploads images, arranges them on a page, and resizes them as needed.
usecase.preconditions: A Notion page is open and ready for editing.
steps: User uploads an image to the page.
User arranges and resizes the image.
User adds captions and alt text for the image.

testcases.name: Valid Image Upload
testcases.description: Verify that a user can successfully upload an image to a page.

testcases.name: Valid Image Resize
testcases.description: Verify that a user can resize an uploaded image to a reasonable percentage.

testcases.name: Too Large Resize Percentage
testcases.description: Verify that an image resize is rejected when the entered percentage amount is too large.

project_description: Notion is a productivity app that helps users manage tasks, projects, and knowledge. Notion can be used for a variety of purposes, including: Capturing thoughts, managing projects, Running a company, and Working on your own or on a team. User can create, join or switch between workspaces. Members can be added in a workspace and allowed mail domains can also be set up in a workspace. User collaborates with team members in a shared database with specific permissions.

usecase.name: Add and Embed Files
usecase.scenario: A user uploads or embeds files like PDFs or documents into a Notion page.
usecase.preconditions: A Notion page is ready for file uploads.
steps: User uploads a PDF file to the page.
User embeds a file link from an external source.
User arranges the file block on the page.

testcases.name: Valid PDF Upload
testcases.description: Verify that a user can upload a PDF file to the page.

testcases.name: Too Large Filesize
testcases.description: Verify that a file that is too large is discarded.

testcases.name: Valid External File Embed
testcases.description: Verify that a user can embed a file link from an external URL.

testcases.name: Invalid External File Embed Link
testcases.description: Verify that a file embed is rejected when the link is invalid.

project_description: Notion is a productivity app that helps users manage tasks, projects, and knowledge. Notion can be used for a variety of purposes, including: Capturing thoughts, managing projects, Running a company, and Working on your own or on a team. User can create, join or switch between workspaces. Members can be added in a workspace and allowed mail domains can also be set up in a workspace. User collaborates with team members in a shared database with specific permissions.

usecase.name: Embed and Manage Media
usecase.scenario: A user embeds videos and audio files into a Notion page.
usecase.preconditions: A Notion page is open for editing.
steps: User embeds a video from a streaming service.
User uploads an audio file.
User resizes and aligns the media blocks.

testcases.name: Embed Video
testcases.description: Verify that a user can embed a video from a streaming platform.

testcases.name: Upload Audio File
testcases.description: Verify that a user can upload an audio file and play it in Notion.

testcases.name: Unsupported Media Format
testcases.description: Verify that unsupported audio or video formats fail to play.

expected.outcome: Playback fails, with a message indicating unsupported format.

testcases.name: Exceeds File Size Limit
testcases.description: Verify that uploading a file that exceeds the size limit fails.

expected.outcome: Upload fails with a message about exceeding the file size limit.

Notion can be used for a variety of purposes, including: Capturing thoughts, managing projects, Running a company, and Working on your own or on a team. User can create, join or switch between workspaces. Members can be added in a workspace and allowed mail domains can also be set up in a workspace. User collaborates with team members in a shared database with specific permissions.
